    • showGameStatus

      public void showGameStatus(Board left, Board right, boolean debugMode)
      Prints both boards in a user-friendly format with the full information of userÂ´s board. The information of computerÂ´s board will depend. If the debugMode if false it will be only the hit and missed shots, if it is true it will be the full information of the board
      Parameters:
      left - , userÂ´s board
      right - , computerÂ´s board
      debugMode - , boolean with true for using the debug mode (for normal games user false)

    • showShotMessage

      public void showShotMessage(Square.Damage damage)
      Prints the information of the shot dpending on the shot result: MISS, HIT!! (sprint 1) MISS, HIT!!. Continue, HIT AND SUNK!!. Continue (from sprint 2 on)
      Parameters:
      damage - , boolean with true if the shot hit some ship and false if not
